about_the_game:
Welcome to Inherent Resolve - an exciting and immersive player friendly campaign for the F/A-18C Hornet in Syria.
Join the multinational coalition and fight against ISIS in 13 epic missions, suitable for flyers at all skill levels. With emphasis on experience and gameplay Inherent Resolve puts you front seat inside the world's most powerful military force. Whether flying as part of a strike package or leading your own wing, each unique mission brings a diverse range of challenges and scenarios.

You are Stryker - a likeable and handsome rookie deployed to Incirlik Airbase, Turkey with your wingman “Jazzman”.

This progressive campaign utilises a range of target locations and airfields meaning that you will be bombing some of the best parts of the map!
Aircraft are hot-starts. Mission briefs are quick and easy and come supplied with kneeboards, mission PDFS and associated imagery.

The action piles up fast as you navigate your way through a series of dramatic and exciting mission sets that you will enjoy playing again and again

- Welcome to Inherent Resolve

Key features:
  • Realistic, highly detailed scenarios
  • Immersive and exciting gameplay
  • Simple mission briefs
  • Hot-start aircraft
  • Weapons & waypoints loaded
  • Kneeboard and PDF for all missions
  • Push & Command other units
  • 1,000s of detailed custom voice lines
  • Cinematic soundtrack
  • Fly reconnaissance sorties on the Syrian border
  • Attack enemy airfields as part of a strike package
  • Battle for the Euphrates Dam
  • Destroy critical key oil infrastructure
  • Hunt high value targets with task force zeus
  • Defend against vehicle-borne improvised explosive devices
  • Lead and PUSH flights onto target as you progress
  • Drop bridges with precision using laser guided bombs

Required modules:
  • DCS: F/A-18C Hornet
  • DCS: Syria (map)

Localization:
  • Voiceovers: English
  • Briefings/Subtitles: English

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum
  • OS: Windows 10
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 3.0Ghz+ with 2 cores or more
  • RAM: 8GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 4GB+
  • Input: Keyboard / Mouse / Joystick
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended
  • OS: Windows 10
  • CPU: Intel or AMD 4.5Ghz+ with 6 cores or more
  • RAM: 32GB+ RAM
  • Video: Discrete AMD or NVIDIA 8GB+
  • Input: Joystick / Pedals / VR / Track IR / Haptic Gloves

short_description: Welcome to Inherent Resolve - an exciting and immersive player friendly campaign for the F/A-18C Hornet in Syria.
